nodes.text: Clan Moxla was a Kiffar family line. Members of the family distinguished themselves with a black patterned tattoo across their cheeks. They had a historical feud with Clan Konshi. This led to the phrase, "Never trust a Konshi," used by some of the Moxla clan.
During the Cold War, Larin Moxla joined forces with Jedi Padawan Shigar Konshi and did not let the clan feud affect their relationship.
